items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: ThingTwin is a lightweight, web-based toolkit for building IoT-powered digital twins using Vue3 and Three.js. It combines real-time device simulation, 2D/3D topology editing, and industrial protocol integration into one seamless workflow.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript module (static-firebase-rtdb) for simplifying Firebase Realtime Database interactions in static frontend projects. Provides promise-based functions for common operations like push, get, update, delete, and real-time data listening.

Provides promise-based functions for common operations like push, get, update, delete, and real-time data listening.
